--- Lynxiz / Axis / Lokk ---

Lynxiz reaches the base of the mountain, and transforms, drawing 
her disk launcher. She aims, and fires three impact explosive disks 
at the largest target there, Train Wreck. She growls to herself, 
"You ain't gettin away easy this time." She prepares for another 
round of fire.

Axis, who is standing around with Lokk and Seekker, is suprised 
when weaponfire starts streaking around him. "Whoa, that was 
close!" He turns around, and spots some bots he knows: Train 
Wreck, McGowan and her group, and Demos. He watches the 
fighting until Lokk smacks him, "Axis, wake up, we've gotta defend 
the base." Lokk draws his twin chain guns, and starts running 
towards McGowan, firing continuously. Shells litter the ground, 
behind him.

Startled, Axis draws his charging laser, and his missile launcher. 
He looks around, unsure of which enemy bot to attack. He yells to 
Lokk, "Lokk, which one should I attack?" Exasperated, Lokk calls 
back, " Just chose one!" So Axis looks around again, and spots 
Barrymore. He follows Lokk firing two missiles at Barrymore, and 
powering up his large laser.
